predictions.text: S&P 500 Index (SPX) will close at a new all-time high on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A daily official close for the S&P 500 (SPX) exceeding its prior record close, as reported by S&P Dow Jones Indices or equivalent market-data sources, occurring on or before 2025-12-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: SPX vs prior record close (market data)
U.S. Treasury yields (2y/10y) and real yields
Macro prints: CPI/PCE, claims, retail sales
predictions.rationale: Fed easing, falling yields, and resilient macro increase probability of a year-end equity record.

predictions.text: COMEX Gold (GC) front-month futures will settle at or above $2,500/oz on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME/COMEX official settlement price for the front-month GC futures contract is ≥ $2,500.00/oz on or before 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.rationale: Lower real yields, tariff/trade uncertainty, and geopolitical risk support an upside tail for gold.

predictions.text: USD/JPY spot will trade at or below 140.00 on at least one UTC day by 2026-01-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any intraday trade in USD/JPY at or below 140.00 recorded by major FX data sources (Refinitiv/Bloomberg) on or before 2026-01-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: BOJ policy guidance and JGB yields
Risk sentiment and equity moves (Nikkei, SPX)
U.S. inflation prints and Fed communication
predictions.rationale: Fed cuts narrow rate differentials; BOJ policy normalization risk and risk-off episodes can push USD/JPY lower.

predictions.text: The Bank of Japan will leave its short-term policy rate unchanged at its December 2025 meeting.
predictions.verification_criteria: BOJ Monetary Policy Statement for the December 2025 MPM shows no change to the short-term policy rate from its prior setting.
monitoring_signals: Pre-meeting BOJ press reports and leaks
JPY moves and JGB yield dynamics
Domestic data: wages, CPI ex-fresh food
predictions.rationale: Despite inflation progress, BOJ likely prioritizes stability amid global easing and fragile domestic demand.

predictions.text: Microsoft’s January 2026 Patch Tuesday will include at least one Critical-severity Remote Code Execution vulnerability affecting Windows.
predictions.verification_criteria: Microsoft Security Update Guide for January 2026 lists ≥1 CVE with Severity: Critical and Impact: Remote Code Execution that affects a supported Windows SKU.
monitoring_signals: Advance notifications and MSRC blog posts
predictions.rationale: Windows regularly receives Critical RCE fixes on Patch Tuesday; base rates are high.

predictions.text: CISA will add at least one Chrome/Chromium V8 zero-day (known exploited) to the KEV Catalog by 2026-01-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CISA KEV Catalog includes ≥1 CVE for Google Chrome/Chromium V8 marked as Known Exploited, with an 'Added to Catalog' date on or before 2026-01-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Chrome Stable Channel updates citing 'actively exploited'
Threat intel reports on in-the-wild Chrome exploits
predictions.rationale: Chrome frequently discloses in-the-wild V8 issues; CISA typically mirrors them quickly in KEV.

predictions.text: NOAA SWPC will report a planetary Kp index reading of at least 7 (G3-level geomagnetic activity) on at least one 3-hour interval by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: SWPC Kp index data (preliminary or definitive) shows any interval with Kp ≥ 7 on or before 2025-12-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Solar flare class and CME arrival predictions
Solar wind speed and Bz components at L1
predictions.rationale: Solar Cycle 25 is near peak; recent strong activity raises odds of G3 geomagnetic conditions.

predictions.text: U.S. New Home Sales (SAAR) for November 2025 will print between 650,000 and 750,000.
predictions.verification_criteria: U.S. Census/HUD New Residential Sales press release for November 2025 (SAAR) headline level falls within 650k–750k.
predictions.rationale: Lower rates and builder incentives support sales, but affordability constraints cap upside.

predictions.text: U.S. Durable Goods Orders (headline, MoM, SA) for November 2025 will print between -0.4% and +1.2%.
predictions.verification_criteria: U.S. Census Bureau Manufacturers’ Shipments, Inventories, and Orders (M3) advance report shows November 2025 headline durable goods new orders change within -0.4% to +1.2% MoM (SA).
predictions.rationale: Manufacturing remains soft but stable; aircraft volatility and core goods likely keep headline in a modest band.

predictions.text: U.S. JOLTS Job Openings for November 2025 will print between 8.6 million and 9.3 million (seasonally adjusted).
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS JOLTS November 2025 press release shows total job openings (seasonally adjusted level) within 8.6–9.3 million.
predictions.rationale: Openings have trended lower with cooling wage growth; modest slackening continues without sharp deterioration.

predictions.text: The U.S. 2-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS2) will close at or below 4.00% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series DGS2 daily close ≤ 4.00% on any trading day on or before 2025-12-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Fed path implied by OIS/ED futures
Treasury auction demand and term premiums
predictions.rationale: Post-cut repricing and benign inflation prints can pull 2y yields briefly below 4%.

predictions.text: NYMEX Henry Hub natural gas front-month futures will settle at or above $3.25 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2026-01-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME/NYMEX official settlement for front-month NG futures is ≥ $3.25/MMBtu on or before 2026-01-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: EIA storage draws and pipeline flows
Freeport LNG feedgas and export capacity
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand and potential cold snaps create upside tails into late January.

predictions.text: Apple will publish a January 2026 iOS/iPadOS security update acknowledging at least one WebKit vulnerability that 'may have been actively exploited.'
predictions.verification_criteria: Apple’s January 2026 security updates page for iOS/iPadOS includes at least one WebKit CVE with the phrase 'may have been actively exploited.'
monitoring_signals: Citizen Lab/Amnesty reports on in-the-wild exploits
predictions.rationale: Apple frequently patches in-the-wild WebKit issues; early-year releases are common.

predictions.text: In at least one Weekly Petroleum Status Report released by 2026-01-31, U.S. operable refinery utilization will be reported at or above 92.0%.
predictions.verification_criteria: EIA WPSR Table 1 shows 'Percent Utilization of Operable Capacity' for U.S. refineries ≥ 92.0% in any report issued on or before 2026-01-31.
predictions.rationale: Less likely in deep winter, but a rebound post-maintenance or strong product cracks could briefly lift utilization.
